commit.message: Release 0.4.2

Merge pull request #27 from thejameskyle/empty-strings
Add support for empty string translations
Add support for empty string translations. Fixes #26
Build for 0.4.1

Merge pull request #14 from jgill333/jgill-additionalPluralRules-1
Adding additional plural rule members for three languages

Merge pull request #15 from terinjokes/warn-handler
Allow overriding the warn handler.
Allow overriding the warn handler.

Adding additional plural rules
Adding support for Brazilian Portuguese (french / 2 plural rule), Persian (chinese / 0 plural rule), and Lao (chinese / 0 plural rule).

Merge pull request #12 from airbnb/nested-phrases
Support nested phrase objects

Support nested phrase objects
* Support both in `extend()` and in the constructor. * Update docs & README. * Update version to 0.4.0.

Oops -- update Polyglot.VERSION to 0.3.0
Back awhile ago we released v0.3.0, but forgot to update `Polyglot.VERSION` to `"0.3.0"` in the code.
Release 0.3.0
syntax highlighting for code blocks

Merge pull request #7 from chenglou/new-t
remove pluralize, add its functionalities to t
update readme tests
add pluralization tests back

update docs to match the change to t
- Also noticed inconsistencies in tab/space in README, replaced the few tabs into space.
- Slight precision on phrases.

remove pluralize, add its functionalities to t
`t` now accepts, as a second parameter, a number as a shortcut to `{smart_count: theNumber}`. The feature of `pluralize` that reads an object's length is removed, as passing the explicit form `obj.length` looks better.
Removing unused Handlebars file in test/vendor
Update version for bower, component
Release 0.2.2.
Update README description of 'pluralize'
Update built files
add bower.json file
component version -> 0.2.1
0.2.1: added 'allowMissing' option

Merge pull request #3 from ziad-saab/master
Provide support for a default language
Added support for initialization with allowMissing. If false, then missing translation returns key with a warning. If true, missing translation uses key as the actual translation.
Fall back on key when neither translation nor _ value is provided
updating built files
